Interface MessageAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabaseAction, CloneErrataAction, NewCloneErrataAction, NewUserAction, RestartSatelliteAction, SsmChangeBaseChannelSubscriptionsAction, SsmChangeChannelSubscriptionsAction, SsmConfigFilesAction, SsmDeleteServersAction, SsmErrataAction, SsmInstallPackagesAction, SsmPackagesAction, SsmPowerManagementAction, SsmRemovePackagesAction, SsmSystemRebootAction, SsmUpgradePackagesAction, SsmVerifyPackagesAction, TestAction, TestDBAction, TestExceptionAction, TraceBackAction, UpdateErrataCacheAction

    public interface MessageAction
    A interface representing a class that can act on a EventMessage
